During this event wish, the event-exclusive 5-star character "Scarlet Leaves Pursue Wild Waves" [[Kaedehara Kazuha]] ({{Anemo}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

During this event wish, the 4-star characters "Analytical Harmony" [[Shikanoin Heizou]] ({{Anemo}}), "Eclipsing Star" [[Ningguang]] ({{Geo}}), and "Protector From Afar" [[Thoma]] ({{Pyro}}) will receive a huge drop-rate boost!

After this event wish ends, the new 4-star character "Analytical Harmony" Shikanoin Heizou ({{Anemo}}) will be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]" in the next Version.

Of the above characters, the event-exclusive character will not be available in the standard wish "[[Wanderlust Invocation]]."

For information about rates, see [[Wishes]].
